name: Steel Battalion
description:
Steel Battalion is an action game developed by Capcom Production Studio 4 and Nude Maker. It came out on 12-09-2002. Capcom published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Steel Battalion has a score of 83. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Steel Battalion on Xbox.
It was produced by Atsushi Inaba. Hifumi Kono directed the game. It was scored by Naru Shirai.
